properties.title: Pumptrack Zweisimmen
properties.abstract: Action, Fun, Technical skills: Integrated in the school and sports centre, you can find the pump track, the new meeting point in Zweisimmen. For bikes, scooters, inline skates or skateboards this is the place to be.
properties.description:
There are several variations of courses for beginners and skilled drivers, on an area of over 1’500 m2, with a length of 200m. 

The target is to build up speed by pumping your body up without using the pedals. You can learn to master the rides in narrow curves and over waves. It’s a track for all generations. 

Due to a tarmac surface, the track is weatherproof and can be used all year, except during snowfall.
properties.name: Pumptrack Zweisimmen
